description: A React component for displaying details of a test case, including fetching case data, handling execution and queuing actions, and rendering UI elements based on user permissions and state.

methods.name: CaseDetail
methods.description: React functional component that manages the state and UI for case details.

methods.name: onExecute
methods.description: Triggers execution of the case by calling the API.

methods.name: onQueue
methods.description: Adds the case to the execution queue via API.
